name: Soggy Bunny
description:
Who likes Soggy Bunnies? Nobody.

Use the arrow keys to pick up and carry all your bunnies out the door in this exciting puzzle adventure.

Hit R to restart a level if you get in trouble.

This is the official submission to the Ludum Dare 42 Jam.

(Seriously though, I set this game up to teach my daughter how to make puzzles. Expect us to post some updates as we add and refine the puzzles.)
